item.title: This message is from Mon Power. On Tuesday, September 10, 20
item.description: This message is from Mon Power. On Tuesday, September 10, 2024, there will be a planned power outage to upgrade facilities. The outage will affect customers in the vicinity of Jane Lew, New Milton, and Salem, WV. You will experience a service interruption from approximately 7:30 am to 2:30 pm. In the event of inclement weather the planned outage will be rescheduled for Wednesday, September 11, 2024. If you have any questions please call: 800-686-0022. Mon Power thanks you for your patience and understanding while we perform this work to improve your electric service reliability.This outage starts on Meathouse Fork near the intersection with Red Lick Rd and continues throughout the southeast area of Doddridge County. It does affect a few customers near the Harrison/Lewis County Line, hence the mention of Jane Lew.
